verses.roman:
rājā miśrera caraṇa yabe cāpite lāgilā
tabe miśra tāṅre kichu bhaṅgīte kahilā

synonyms: rāja—the King; miśrera—of Kāśī Miśra; caraṇa—the lotus feet; yabe—when; cāpite lāgilā—began to press; tabe—at that opportunity; miśra—Kāśī Miśra; tāṅre—unto him; kichu—something; bhaṅgīte—by a hint; kahilā—informed.
translation: When the King began pressing his lotus feet, Kāśī Miśra informed him about something through hints.
